name: The Dot
description:
Here we go again. You just wanted to create what has never been done before, and what's left is a stream of tiny little games that go in all sorts of directions. It's a pity because you never wanted to show them to people, but oops… now it’s too late

I’m releasing this collection of games
so that you may start talking to me again

Features!

  • 1 catastrophically thicc pigeon
  • One billion trillion folders
  • Gameplay and puzzles that may go too far beyond the game window
  • I think I found a second pigeon

  • this guy is just too annoying ^



Some features of The Dot are not typical of games in general
Don't be alarmed. It's all part of the game
